### Version history

This page provides information about older or alternative versions of  indicative distribution map for this ecosystem functional group [**{{< meta params.efgname >}}**](/efg-info/MT1_4.qmd).
Check the current maps [here](/map-info/MT1_4_valid.qmd).

- Indicative Map (**code: MT1.4.IM.orig**, version v2.1) discarded 
 - Web navigation (**code: MT1.4.web.grid**, version v2.0) discarded 
 - Indicative Map (**code: MT1.4.IM.orig**, version v1.0) discarded 
 - Indicative Map (**code: MT1.4.IM.grid**, version v1.0) discarded 
 - Web navigation (**code: MT1.4.web.orig**, version v1.0) requires review 

### Datasets

Datasets considered for previous versions of the indicative map

- **GSFM-2014** (Harris PT et al. 2014).
 - **MEOW-2008** (Spalding MD et al.  2008).

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset   |url                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
|:---------|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|GSFM-2014 |<http://www.bluehabitats.org/?page_id=9>{target='links'} :: <https://www.grida.no/publications/112>{target='links'} :: <https://www.dropbox.com/s/jvaprrz8snnzvfo/global%20seafloor%20geomorphic%20features%20map.zip?dl=0>{target='links'}                                             |
|MEOW-2008 |<https://www.worldwildlife.org/publications/marine-ecoregions-of-the-world-a-bioregionalization-of-coastal-and-shelf-areas>{target='links'} :: <https://databasin.org/datasets/3b6b12e7bcca419990c9081c0af254a2>{target='links'} :: <http://maps.tnc.org/gis_data.html>{target='links'} |


:::
:::

### Available files

You can download geospatial data for older versions of these maps from the following sources:

**MT1.4.IM.orig** (v2.1): [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958622){target="gisdata"}

**MT1.4.web.grid** (v2.0): [Mapbox tileset](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.MT1_4_web_grid){target="gisdata"}

**MT1.4.IM.orig** (v1.0): [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](10.5281/zenodo.3546514){target="gisdata"}

**MT1.4.web.orig** (v1.0): [GitHub repository](https://github.com/red-list-ecosystem/typology-map-data/blob/master/data/layers/MT1.4.web.orig_topo.json){target="gisdata"}

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.

###  License information

Indicative maps have been released with a ![](https://zenodo.org/static/icons/licenses/cc-by-icon.svg){height=20} Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International license. 

But see details of dataset licenses below:

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset   |license_info                                                                                             |
|:---------|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|GSFM-2014 |https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/                                                             |
|MEOW-2008 |Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 License :: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0 |


:::
:::

## References

References used in these versions of the maps.

- Spalding MD, Fox HE, Allen GR, Davidson N, Ferdaña ZA, Finlayson M, Halpern BS, Jorge MA, Lombana A, Lourie SA, Martin KD, McManus E, Molnar J, Recchia CA, Robertson J (2007) *Marine ecoregions of the world: a bioregionalization of coastal and shelf areas*. **Bioscience** 57: 573–583. DOI:[10.1641/B570707](https://doi.org/10.1641/B570707)
  
 - Harris PT, Macmillan-Lawler M, Rupp J, Baker EK (2014) *Geomorphology of the oceans*. **Marine Geology** 352: 4-24. [10.1016/j.margeo.2014.01.011](https://doi.org/10.1016/j.margeo.2014.01.011)
